Tobit * or Tobias *__09.1: Then Tobias called the angel to him, whom he took to be a man, and said to him: Brother Azarias, I pray thee hearken to my words:
Tobit * or Tobias *__09.2: If I should give myself to be thy servant I should not make a worthy return for thy care.
Tobit * or Tobias *__09.3: However, I beseech thee, to take with thee beasts and servants, and to go to Gabelus to Rages the city of the Medes: and to restore to him his note of hand, and receive of him the money, and desire him to come to my wedding.
Tobit * or Tobias *__09.4: For thou knowest that my father numbereth the days: and if I stay one day more, his soul will be afflicted.
Tobit * or Tobias *__09.5: And indeed thou seest how Raguel hath adjured me, whose adjuring I cannot despise.
Tobit * or Tobias *__09.6: Then Raphael took four of Raguel's servants, and two camels, and went to Rages the city of the Medes: and finding Gabelus, gave him his note of hand, and received of him all the money.
Tobit * or Tobias *__09.7: And he told him concerning Tobias the son of Tobias, all that had been done: and made him come with him to the wedding.
Tobit * or Tobias *__09.8: And when he was come into Raguel's house he found Tobias sitting at the table: and he leaped up, and they kissed each other: and Gabelus wept, and blessed God,
Tobit * or Tobias *__09.9: And said: The God of Israel bless thee, because thou art the son of a very good and just man, and that feareth God, and doth almsdeeds:
Tobit * or Tobias *__09.10: And may a blessing come upon thy wife and upon your parents.
Tobit * or Tobias *__09.11: And may you see your children, and your children's children, unto the third and fourth generation: and may your seed be blessed by the God of Israel, who reigneth for ever and ever.
Tobit * or Tobias *__09.12: And when all had said, Amen, they went to the feast: but the marriage feast they celebrated also with the fear of the Lord.
